Introduction: Oh hello sir.^Oh hello ma'am.  I haven't seen you around before...#$e#Are you the new farmer who just moved into the valley?#$b#Nice to meet you! I'm Philip. I work as a physical therapist for some individuals in the area. I'll see you around!$h
spring_1: I love running in the spring.#$b#Not too hot, not too cold, and you get to watch the flowers come up day after day.$h
spring_12: Festivals weren't really a thing, where I'm from, but I'm looking forward to tomorrow.$h
spring_23: When I think of dances, I think of high school and working up my nerve to ask out the person I liked.$l#$b#Kind of different as an adult, huh?$6
summer_1: I love summer. Remember to stay hydrated, okay?#$b#Heat exhaustion is no joke.
summer_10: Sand is a really strange surface to walk on. It can be challenging for people who are unsteady on their feet...#$b#I hope everything goes smoothly tomorrow.
summer_27: Yuuma asked a question about jellyfish yesterday and I didn't know the answer, so I looked it up.#$e#Jellyfish move by creating propulsion through radial dilation and contraction of their bell. Isn't that cool?$h
fall_1: I like to hike the mountains at this season.#$b#Too bad I'm really busy as well though.$s
fall_15: Alex and I have this kind of mock rivalry going on where we try to see who's stronger.$6#$b#I'm going to challenge him to the strongman game tomorrow.$6
fall_26: Are you looking forward to tomorrow?#$e#I'm not a huge fan of spooky things, but the costumes are always cool.$h
winter_1: Be careful to stay warm, @!#$b#Hypothermia is a serious bummer.$s
winter_7: You have fishing experience, right?#$b#I'm worried about someone overexerting themselves and pulling something, tomorrow.$s
winter_14: The Night Market starts tomorrow?$u#$b#I wonder if they'll have any rare books...
winter_15: Did you see the mermaid?$u#$b#I’m not crazy, right?#$b#That really happened?$u
winter_16: I think I need to stop trying to make all this make sense.$s#$b#Mermaids exist, pigs can pull boats, it’s fine.$u
winter_17: I don’t know how, but they had a first-run copy of Cyberman #13!$u#$b#I’ve wanted this for years!$h
winter_24: It'll be a new year soon.#$e#Time sure does fly. Was it a good year for you?$h
Mon: Hello sir.^Hello ma'am.#$e#Hope you have a good day today.$h
Tue: Hello sir.^Hello ma'am.#$e#Do you need anything?
Wed: Hello sir.^Hello ma'am. How's your week been so far?
Thu: Hello sir.^Hello ma'am.#$b#Doing well?#$e# Remember to stretch regularly. It'll decrease the chances of straining something.
Fri: Vastus Medialis muscle originates from the proximal medial part of the femur...#$e#%Philip is talking to himself under his breath. Better leave him alone.
Sat: Hello sir.^Hello ma'am.#$b#We made it to the weekend$h!
Sun: Hello sir.^Hello ma'am. #$b# Hope you're doing well. Need anything?
Mon2: I try really hard not to talk about physical therapy and anatomy too much.$l#$b#I really love what I do, so I sometimes get carried away.$h
Tue2: Hello! I hope you're doing well today.#$b#If you need any help, I'm here.$l
Wed2: I didn't really know what to expect when I accepted the job out here, but I'm enjoying it so far.$h
Thu2: Doctor Harvey acts as my supervisor and referring physician, so I work pretty closely with him.#$e#He's quiet, but he's a really good doctor and good guy.$h
Fri2: Hi! You made it to the end of the week.#$b#Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Sat2: Hey, I know this is nosy, but I saw those bruises on your arm the other day.#$b#Everything okay?$s#$e#Just from farming! That's good! I was worried for a bit there.$h
Sun2: I'm really glad the hotel has a gym. It makes it a lot easier to stay in shape. #$e#You'd be surprised how much strength you need to be a good physical therapist!
Mon4: Good day to you @! You look like you're doing well.#$b#Remember to stay hydrated, okay?
Tue4: Oh, my shoulders are sore.$s#$e#I've been doing a lot of one-man transfers and lifts these last few days.#$b#Guess I've got to take my own advice and remember to stretch, haha!$h
Wed4: Is it just you out at that farm?#$b#What do you do if you need help with something?$u#$e#Wait... what's your plan if you get hurt?$u
Thu4: I talked to Emily the other day and she told me about the yoga classes she and Ysa are thinking about doing at the hotel.#$e#I might join them if I can find the time. Yoga is amazing for flexibility and core strength.$h
Fri4: Hello, @! We made it through another week. I'm planning on a good long Revengers marathon this weekend. I hope you have plans to relax!
Sat4: Sometimes I wonder if Alex tried to get to know me just to use me as his personal physical therapist...  I don't mind too much, though, because we're friends now.
Sun4: I usually say something about getting enough exercise, even to my friends...#$b#But you're probably getting all the exercise you need out at that farm!$h
Mon6: Hello @ sir!^Hello @ ma'am. How's the farm work going?#$e#I bought some of your produce from Pierre the other day to make a salad, and it was amazing. How do you do it?$h
Tue6: I'm living in the Log Cabin hotel for now, since I'll just be in the area until Shiro completes his physical therapy.#$b#That'll take a while, though, and I like it here, so I'm not exactly rushing it!
Wed6: Harvey and I met at university, actually. He's older than me, but we shared some exercise physiology classes.#$b#Of course, he went on to medical school, and I stuck with physical therapy, but it's nice to reconnect with old classmates!$h
Thu6: Good day to-- wait.#$b#Stand straight for me?$a#$b#%Philip is studying you intently.#$b#Your shoulders are bothering you, aren't they? Remember to stretch! You can use a tennis ball to try and work it out, but be gentle!
Fri6: Remember to get enough sleep!#$b#It has a huge effect on way more than just how drowsy or energetic you are.$h
Sat6: Ysabelle dances at the studio in the gym sometimes. She's really incredible. Her grandpa keeps a close eye on me though. But I swear, I'm not interested in pursuing his granddaughter!$u
Sun6: You've been a good friend, @.#$b#Thank you for that!  If you need any help when you feel your body's bogging you down, I'm always here alright?$h
Mon8: @! Oh! How are you? Sorry, sorry, I was just surprised! I mean, you surprised me!#$b#I guess I was lost in my thoughts. Anyways, What's up?$h
Tue8: Hey, I've been curious about your farm for some time now.#$b#How did you get it from what it was to what it is now? It seems like so much work.
Wed8: Oh hi, @! You look good today.#$b#I don't mean it weirdly! You just have a spring in your step, I guess.$l
Thu8: If you're ever free around lunchtime, let me know. It'll be my treat.#$b#No ulterior motives, promise!$h
Fri8: Good day to you sir^Good day to you maam.#$b#I mean @! Sorry! It's a habit!$h#$e#Hey, Wanna hang out sometime? I enjoy your company.$l
Sat8: Are you a Risorius muscle? Cause I can't... uh.#$b#Sorry. I was going to use a cheesy line and then realized it's weird technical jargon... um. Ignore that.$l#$b#How's your day going?
Sun8: I was on a physical therapy forum the other day to ask a question, and someone wanted to know what I specialize in.#$b#When I told them I don't have a specialty, they started accusing me of lying about what I do...$s
Mon10: Hey! How'd you sleep?$h#$b#This might sound weird but you're looking good. So you must've gotten a good sleep.$h#$b#That's great! It means you're being healthy!$h
Tue10: Hey, are you an S.A. Node?#$b#Cause you make my heart go thump, thump, thump!$l#$b#Cheesy, I know, but it did make you smile!$h
Wed10: It doesn't exactly make sense for me to invite you to work out with me... so, if you need help around the farm, let me know!$h
Thu10: Hey, how's that shoulder doing? I know it was bothering you.#$b#I can come by later and work on it, if you want.$l
Fri10: I know you don't exactly get days off, but I'd love to take a walk with you sometime.#$b#It'd be nice to just chat.$l
Sat10: found a copy of a comic I loved when I was a kid on iBuy the other day.#$b#The package should arrive today!$h
Sun10: Hey!$l#$b#%Philip has a huge smile on his face.#He just seems really happy to see you.
breakUp: I...I don't wanna talk about it, @. Let's just forget about it.$s
danceRejection: I'm can't, I need to make sure I'm available if anyone needs me.
divorced: Don't talk to me. I'm done.$a
MovieInvitation: Sure, @! What time should we meet?$h#$b#Finally, I can get some time away from work.$h#$e#Thank you for inviting me, @.$l
Resort_Entering: Oh, wow! I know what I'm going to do first. Time for a swim!$h
Resort_Leaving: No... So soon?$s#$b#Ahhh, I'll be back as soon as I have the time!
Resort_Leaving_2: I'm really grateful that I had the time to loosen up today.#$b#I don't get much time to relax as I'd like, to be honest.$h
Resort_Shore: %Philip has his face turned to the sky and his eyes closed.#He looks very happy.#Better not bother him
Resort_Shore_2: Destressing is just as important as getting enough sleep, you know.#$b#Too much cortisol can wreak havoc on your body. So slow down and enjoy this!$h
Resort_Umbrella: I definitely did not put on enough sunscreen, so I'll be staying under this umbrella for a bit.$s
Resort_Umbrella_2: I used to love making sand castles when I was little.#$b#I kind of want to give it a shot again.
Resort_Umbrella_3: Going to the beach is such a great way to soak up tons of vitamin sea. Get it?$h
Resort_Wander: This island looks like something out of a comic... like I could step into a jungle and find a whole lost civilization.$h
Resort_Bar: ~If you like Pina Coladas! And getting caught in the rain!~ Ah, I saw pina coladas on their menu and that song popped into my head.#$b#You know, the one from the Watchers of the Milky Way?$h
Resort: Talk about relieving some stress!#$b#This is an amazing way to spend a day off.$h
